spiritsExplanation:
The "Beginner Whole Body Pilates" workout is classified primarily with a "Flow & Rhythm" spirit due to its focus on Pilates, which inherently emphasizes smooth, controlled movements and a strong mind-body connection. The choice of remixed and rhythmic music supports this classification by enhancing the flow of the workout. The score of 0.7 reflects this strong fit.

Additionally, a "Structured & Disciplined" spirit is present, as Pilates often follows a methodical progression through exercises aimed at improving core strength and flexibility. The term "beginner friendly" in the description implies a structured approach suitable for newcomers, justifying a score of 0.6.

The workout is not aligned with "High-Energy & Intense" since it is beginner-friendly and lacks any mention of intensive training. Similarly, "Soothing & Restorative," "Sport & Agility," and "Outdoor & Adventure" spirits do not fit, as there is no emphasis on recovery, athletics, or outdoor components in the metadata.
